snippet: The 87 men, women and children were apparently stranded after a desperate search for water as they tried to make their way across the border to Algeria.
abstract: Decomposing bodies of 87 migrants from Niger are discovered in the Sahara a few miles from a well, apparently stranded after a desperate search for water; two trucks carrying the migrants, men, women and children, broke down in the desert while trying to reach neighboring Algeria.
lead_paragraph: The 87 men, women and children were apparently stranded after a desperate search for water as they tried to make their way across the border to Algeria.

headline.main: Scores of Migrants From Niger Found Dead in Sahara
headline.print_headline: Migrants From Niger Found Dead In Sahara
